variantdescription: Boeing B-29A base version. WW2 type which also saw service in the Korean War.
loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. Only low-drag bombs can be carried. Load options are: (a) four 4,000 lb bombs, (b) eight 2,000 lb bombs, (c) twelve 1,000 lb bombs, (d) forty 500 lb bombs.
variantnotes: Gun Turrets. Equipped with eleven .50 cal M2 guns, eight in four twin turrets and three in the tail mount. They can fire in any direction. They may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. The roll to hit is 2/1/1 and the AtA rating is 2. Gun attacks are modified only by the target size and have a -1 modifier when firing into the 60- arc. Ammunition is unlimited.
notes: Flight Restrictions. UD, VD, ZC, and VC are forbidden. SC and SD may only use 1 VFP per turn. SD may only lose 1 altitude level per VFP. Limited to power setting N with H or C damage.
